description: Translate only rows where shrln or vegetation communities have precise values.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID.
Maps source value to SOIL_MOIST_REG using lists of values.

Note that every polygon is either LYR or NFL, not both. If stand structure is C, V, S or M, return 100. If stand structure is H, return structure_val multiplied by 10. If structure is horizontal and percent is zero, return 100.

Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow. Counts layer 1 if typeclass is not an NFL class and species 1, 2, 3 or 4 is present. Counts layer 2 if mintypeclass is not an nfl class and species 1, 2, 3 or 4 is present. Counts layer 1 and layer 2 nfl if nfl codes is present.
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
